thread.title: Protestors march at Birmingham airport: "I am proud," city's Islamic Society president says
thread.title_full: Protestors march at Birmingham airport: "I am proud," city's Islamic Society president says

author: Ivana Hrynkiw | ihrynkiw@al.com
title: Protestors march at Birmingham airport: "I am proud," city's Islamic Society president says

organizations.name: jefferson county probate judge alan king

text: Jefferson County Probate Judge Alan King was present at the protest and spoke to the crowd, saying members of Congress should act. "Don't let these people off the hook," he said. "They need to stand up, they need to do the right thing. They need to treat people fairly. We should not let this happen."
